table.name: vtiger_projectteam
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_projectteam` ( `projectteamid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `projectteamnote` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `projectteamfunction` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `teamrelproject` int(15) DEFAULT NULL, `teamrelcontact` int(15) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_projectteamcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_projectteamcf` ( `projectteamid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectteamid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
